sub_title: Freelance Director, Editor, and Videographer, Customer and Technical Support, Client Relations
summary:
Hello!

My name is Shawn! I am an American who has been living here in the Netherlands for 13 years now. I have experience working in various fields, many of which I believe share transferable skills that would be perfect for the position I am applying for. I believe these experiences have taught me invaluable lessons about professionalism, communicating and working well with others in a team environment, and giving me the perspective to apply those experiences to whatever new position I might find myself in.

For the past number of years, I have been working on my own as a freelance director, editor, and videographer, along with my father’s beverage company. My father decided to retire at the beginning of the year, and while I have enjoyed the freedom and creativity working for myself as a content creator, I am in need of a change. Thanks to Covid-19 throwing a large wrench into the business of music and live entertainment, I have found the need for a career with more stability. I have a 13-year-old son, along with a fiancée. The volatility of being freelance in a post-Covid world, along with the safety net of working with my father being removed, I need work that I can depend on. I am confident with my experience in both life and work I can be a strong asset to any team that I join.

I like to think am a very hard worker who always gives maximum effort. Being an editor requires you to be exceptionally organized, have the ability use different complicated technical programs to be creative, and use communication skills to interface with colleagues and clients. Even when working alone video and content creation remains a very collaborative effort.  I take pride in those skills and my ability to problem solve and adapt to any situation put in front of me. I get along very well with other people, and always try to have a smile and enjoy my work. When spending so much of your life with clients and colleagues I think it is especially important to be friendly, kind, and respectful.

I am extremely proficient with many computer programs and systems. I am a very quick learner, particularly with technology, and haven’t found a computer program I can’t master. I can work with everything from simple word processing programs to more complex video editing or music recording software, as well as things such as customer service solutions and inventory management. If there is a program for it, I either know how to use it or will master it in short manner.

Thank you for reading!

education.field_of_study: School of Motion Pictures and Television

profile_positions.description: Communicating and working alongside demanding clients, using technical skills with film equipment and various programs to creatively make interesting and enjoyable video and multimedia projects.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Director, Editor, and Videographer

profile_positions.description: Writing and producing training videos and documents for use for over 1200 freelance videographers, photographers, copywriters and voice over artists. Recruiting, training, and maintaining an extensive freelancer database consisting of freelance photographers and videographers from over 10 European countries, as well as Australia and the United States. Editing and corrections of videos in need of revision as requested by management and clients. Technical support and troubleshooting support for said freelancers regarding video specifications, video editing, FTP uploading, and general use of Spotzer's freelancer facing user interface. Marketing our brand using Google AdWords to increase Spotzer's online presence for potential new partners and freelancers across Europe.
profile_positions.title: Client outreach, technical support, editor

profile_positions.description:
Communicating on behalf of the company with the company’s community of players and customers via forum moderation and phone and e-mail support, editing promotional material for both in game and online.
Answering customer support & billing phone calls in a call center environment.
profile_positions.title: Community and customer management, customer safety, forum moderation.

profile_positions.description:
Working closely with musicians and fans doing interviews and shooting performances and back stage material. Co-Directing along with main songwriter and leader of the band Robert Flynn, working closely on edits and content of the pieces.
Overseeing the filming of multiple live shows, events, and behind the scenes footage.
profile_positions.title: Director, Editor

profile_positions.description:
Working closely with the band as well as supporting musicians and fans shooting interviews, performances, back stage material and 'behind the secenes' footage of multiple video shoots and recording sessions.
Co-directed along with main songwriter and leader of the band Robert Flynn, working closely on edits and content of the pieces for use online, on special edition CDs, and DVD videos.
Overseeing the filming of multiple live shows, promotional events, and special appearances. 
Editing footage for various promotional videos and behind the scenes online featurettes.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Director, Editor, Videographer

profile_positions.description:
Supervised 2 customer support co-workers, led the customer support team during transitional phases within the company.  Utilized mass mailings and Google AdWords to get the company name out to recruitment agencies as well as individual employers encouraging them to advertise on WorkMetro.com. 
Answered customer support e-mails and phone calls through RightNow software for our paying recruitment and employer customers, as well as providing sales support to WorkMetro's sales team.
Quality Assurance testing for engineering and IT department. Monitoring and applying advertisements on WorkMetro.com for the marketing team using programs such as PhPads / OpenX.
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Lead

profile_positions.description:
Recruiting, signing up, and processing paperwork of new members.
Invoicing and billing pre-existing customers, processing memberships.
Customer support and troubleshooting for health club.
profile_positions.title: Front Desk Supervisor, Administrative Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Editing promotional videos to client specifications.
Working closely with house videographer to create promotional materials.
profile_positions.title: Editor

profile_positions.description:
Editing customer and in-house projects including infomercials for local businesses, wedding videos, and photo collages.
Meeting and procuring potential clients for editing and videography jobs.
Troubleshooting and fixing office computers and various video and audio equipment. 
Invoicing and processing new and pre-existing customers, processing duplications and basic customer requests.
Answering phone calls, business inquiries, and administration.
profile_positions.title: Editor, Administrative Asssistant

profile_positions.description:
Setting up studio sessions including micing instruments, preparting the recording desk, setting up rented gear, and more. 
Management of recording studio after hours, including a team of two assitants, while providing technical support for recording artists and producers after hours.
Assisting repair technicians with repair of various microphones, cables, monitors, and recording desks/mixing consoles.
profile_positions.title: Plant Operations Supervisor
